column1:
{{Property proposal
|status            = 483
|description       = the studio where a song/album was recorded
|infobox parameter = [[:en:template:Infobox single]] / [[:en:template:Infobox song]] / [[:en:template:Infobox album]]'''recorded'''
|datatype          = Item
|domain            = items about recordings (mostly songs and albums)
|allowed values    = the name of the studio, regardless if the studio has, or not, a WP article (most studios are not notable)
|source            = The list of studios can be found on the recording's booklet, or the artist's website. This information usually appears on the infobox of WP articles about the recording
|example           = [[Q169453|On the Floor]] <''recorded at''> Cove Studios
|robot and gadget jobs =
|proposed by      = — [[User:Hahc21|<font color="#333333">'''ΛΧΣ'''</font>]][[User_talk:Hahc21|<font color="#336699">'''<sup>21</sup>'''</font>]]
}}
This is needed. — [[User:Hahc21|<font color="#333333">'''ΛΧΣ'''</font>]][[User_talk:Hahc21|<font color="#336699">'''<sup>21</sup>'''</font>]] 21:01, 18 April 2013 (UTC)

:{{Support}}, but it would be nice if we could set "item" DataType in case there's a WP article (not only for this case). --[[User:Viscontino|Viscontino]] ([[User talk:Viscontino|talk]]) 11:25, 19 April 2013 (UTC)
::{{comment}} agree. Item is better. --[[User:Nightwish62|Nightwish62]] ([[User talk:Nightwish62|talk]]) 16:01, 19 April 2013 (UTC)

:::I'd like to create items to all studios and change the type to item. Let me see if this can be done :) — [[User:Hahc21|<font color="#333333">'''ΛΧΣ'''</font>]][[User_talk:Hahc21|<font color="#336699">'''<sup>21</sup>'''</font>]] 17:59, 19 April 2013 (UTC)
